data.message:
Hey bros and sis, i m from an undeveloped country ... i don't listen west songs very much...
But i would love to listen to EMINEM songs, so could u plz give some idea for which songs i should start gather and listen to...
I mean some popular or ur favrourite songs ....plz if u think i deserve being a fan of EMINEM

replies.message: just 1 song wich will make you see y eminem has a lot of fans listen 2 run rabbit then yoy will know what am talking about
